name: Dinesh V G
title: Java Full Stack Developer
summary: Developer focused on clean code and scalable web apps using Spring Boot and React (Vite). Experienced in REST APIs, unit testing, Git, and MySQL. Agile collaborator delivering user-friendly solutions.

highlights: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications with backend logic, API integration, and responsive UI.
Built scalable features, wrote unit tests (JUnit/Mockito), ensured smooth data flow across layers.
Collaborated in Agile teams to deliver clean, efficient, user-friendly solutions.

projects.name: Digital Bookstore Management System
projects.summary: E-commerce bookstore built with microservices—user management, catalog, orders, reviews.
highlights: 7 microservices with Spring Boot, service discovery via Netflix Eureka, routing via Spring Cloud Gateway.
Role-based auth, shopping cart, admin portal.
OpenFeign for inter-service calls; JPA + MySQL for persistence.

leadership: Class Representative during training—coordinated schedules and feedback for a productive environment.
